description: This file defines a React component 'Home' serving as a landing page for a Jira-Confluence integration platform. It renders sections including a welcome message, quick access cards for Jira projects, Confluence pages, and connection management, as well as a chat playground component that allows users to select references and view recent selections.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the landing page with various sections and a chat input.
